segments.text: So the company decided to cancel your trip to Hong Kong ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , The SARS epidemic is not under effective control yet . So I'd better not risk it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe it's a good things . If you don't have to go to Hong Kong , you can take a break and take things easy for a while .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are right . Maybe we should work out a fitness plan and start to do more exercise . Sitting around in the office all day is no way of keeping fit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a good idea . Let's see if we can get more people in this plan . There isn't much business these days anyway , so I think many people will be interested .
segments.speaker: S1
